document.full_text: south korean k.j. choi has pledged to donate $200,000 of his earnings from his victory at last week's players championship to help tornado relief in the southeastern united states.
document.title: choi pledges $200,000 to help u.s. tornado relief effort
lines_and_colors: south korean k.j. choi has pledged to donate $200,000 of his earnings from his victory at last week's players championship to help tornado relief in the southeastern united states.
